Contract Details
===============

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Correctional Services Canada (CSC), is soliciting bids from qualified contractors for the Joyceville Institution Treatment Plant Network and SCADA upgrades. The objective of this project is to improve the efficiency and reliability of the treatment plant network and SCADA system.

Eligibility Criteria and Requirements
------------------------------------

* The contractor must be a qualified General Contractor (GC) with the necessary experience and expertise in treatment plant network and SCADA upgrades.
* The contractor must have a good safety record and a proven track record of completing projects on time and within budget.
* The contractor must be able to complete the work within a period of 70 weeks.
